clean_board.description: Clean the board of the table to eliminate any dust particles.

close_drawer.description: Close the opened drawer of the table by sliding it in.

clean_drawer.description: Clean the opened drawer of the table to remove any dust or particles inside.

open_drawer.description: Open the closed drawer of the table by sliding it out.

status_drawer.description: The drawer of the table is already closed.

clean_table_body.description: Clean the body of the table to remove dust or any other particles.

full_clean.description: Clean the entire table including the board, body and drawer.
